CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scales the glow intensity of the inner and outer atmospheres.
CONTROLS.NAME: atmosphere_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Intensity of dust particles on high-frequency peaks.
CONTROLS.NAME: dust_intensity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How far dust particles spread from the moon rim.
CONTROLS.NAME: dust_spread

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Angular coverage of dust particles around rim (0=narrow, 1=full circle).
CONTROLS.NAME: rim_glow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blend amount of user media onto moon surface.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_blend

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale of media projection on sphere.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotation speed of media on moon surface.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_rotation_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much limb fade affects media at sphere edges.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_limb_fade
